++ Object Device Computer Microcontroller

+++ SUMMARY

ObjectDeviceComputer
  * [Attributes]
    * small 
    * physically: on a single metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) integrated circuit (IC) chip. 
    * contains 
      * one or more CPUs (processor cores)
      * memory
      * programmable input/output peripherals 
      * (often) Program memory in the form of 
        * ferroelectric RAM, 
        * NOR flash or 
        * OTP ROM 
      * small amount of RAM. 
    
    * designed for: 
      * embedded applications, 
        * in contrast to the microprocessors used in personal computers or other general purpose applications consisting of various discrete chips.


+++ DETAILS

In modern terminology, a microcontroller is similar to, but less sophisticated than, a system on a chip (SoC).  SystemOnAChip
